alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 4:01PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches through Saturday afternoon. Northeast winds gusting 40 to 50 mph Friday night. Winds turn north to northwest Saturday, gusting 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the late Friday evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Activity transitions to lake effect snow showers later Saturday afternoon into Saturday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
